item.title: By: Eric
item.dc:creator: Eric
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://grandmighty.github.io/grandmighty/2011/07/hardtop/#comment-33683">Thomas</a>.
Hi Thomas,
Yep, the non-Hardtop version did still fit under the roll bar. The 2 corners of the main hoop were very close to the hardtop (I had the base hardtop with no headliner), but it fit fine.
-Eric
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Thomas.

Hi Thomas,

Yep, the non-Hardtop version did still fit under the roll bar. The 2 corners of the main hoop were very close to the hardtop (I had the base hardtop with no headliner), but it fit fine.

-Eric

item.title: By: Thomas
item.dc:creator: Thomas
item.description:
Hi First of all, great work on your Miata - simply love it! I read that you didn't bought a Harddog "Hardtop" Rollbar because it didn't flush with the rooftop, but does the Hardtop stil fit normal after the Rollbar install, or did you have to cut some stuff?
Regards Thomas from Denmark
item.content:encoded:
Hi
First of all, great work on your Miata – simply love it!
I read that you didn’t bought a Harddog “Hardtop” Rollbar because it didn’t flush with the rooftop, but does the Hardtop stil fit normal after the Rollbar install, or did you have to cut some stuff?

Regards
Thomas from Denmark
